data.name: Struggling Demo
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 7+SP1
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Q6600 AMD A6 3620
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GT 340 AMD Radeon HD 7640 Intel HD 4400
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
